00141         StandardApplicationPool pool;
00142         int serverSocket;
00143         int connectSocket;
00144         bool done, detached;
00145         
00146         mutex lock;
00147         thread *serverThread;
00148         set<ClientInfoPtr> clients;

00150         // TODO: check for exceptions in threads, possibly forwarding them
00151         // Don't forget to test them

00153         void serverThreadMainLoop() {
00154                 while (!done) {
00155                         int fds[2], ret;
00156                         char x;
00157                         
00158                         // The received data only serves to wake up the server socket,
00159                         // and is not important.
00160                         do {
00161                                 ret = read(serverSocket, &x, 1);
00162                         } while (ret == -1 && errno == EINTR);
00163                         if (ret == 0) {
00164                                 break;
00165                         }
00166                         
00167                         socketpair(AF_UNIX, SOCK_STREAM, 0, fds);
00168                         MessageChannel(serverSocket).writeFileDescriptor(fds[1]);
00169                         close(fds[1]);
00170                         
00171                         ClientInfoPtr info(new ClientInfo());
00172                         info->fd = fds[0];
00173                         info->thr = new thread(bind(&ApplicationPoolServer::clientThreadMainLoop, this, info));
00174                         mutex::scoped_lock l(lock);
00175                         clients.insert(info);
00176                 }
00177         }
00178         
00179         void clientThreadMainLoop(ClientInfoPtr client) {
00180                 MessageChannel channel(client->fd);
00181                 vector<string> args;
00182                 map<int, Application::SessionPtr> sessions;
00183                 int lastID = 0;
00184 
00185                 while (!done) {
00186                         if (!channel.read(args)) {
00187                                 break;
00188                         }
00189                         
00190                         if (args[0] == "get" && args.size() == 4) {
00191                                 Application::SessionPtr session(pool.get(args[1], args[2], args[3]));
00192                                 channel.write(toString(lastID).c_str(), NULL);
00193                                 channel.writeFileDescriptor(session->getReader());
00194                                 channel.writeFileDescriptor(session->getWriter());
00195                                 session->closeReader();
00196                                 session->closeWriter();
00197                                 sessions[lastID] = session;
00198                                 lastID++;
00199                         } else if (args[0] == "close" && args.size() == 2) {
00200                                 sessions.erase(atoi(args[1].c_str()));
00201                         } else if (args[0] == "setMax") {
00202                                 pool.setMax(atoi(args[1].c_str()));
00203                         } else if (args[0] == "getActive") {
00204                                 channel.write(toString(pool.getActive()).c_str(), NULL);
00205                         } else if (args[0] == "getCount") {
00206                                 channel.write(toString(pool.getCount()).c_str(), NULL);
00207                         }
00208                 }
00209                 
00210                 mutex::scoped_lock l(lock);
00211                 clients.erase(client);
00212         }

00214 public:
00215         ApplicationPoolServer(const string &spawnManagerCommand,
00216                      const string &logFile = "",
00217                      const string &environment = "production",
00218                      const string &rubyCommand = "ruby")
00219         : pool(spawnManagerCommand, logFile, environment, rubyCommand) {
00220                 int fds[2];
00221                 
00222                 if (socketpair(AF_UNIX, SOCK_STREAM, 0, fds) == -1) {
00223                         throw SystemException("Cannot create a Unix socket pair", errno);
00224                 }
00225                 serverSocket = fds[0];
00226                 connectSocket = fds[1];
00227                 done = false;
00228                 detached = false;
00229                 serverThread = new thread(bind(&ApplicationPoolServer::serverThreadMainLoop, this));
00230         }
00231         
00232         ~ApplicationPoolServer() {
00233                 if (!detached) {
00234                         done = true;
00235                         close(connectSocket);
00236                         serverThread->join();
00237                         delete serverThread;
00238                         close(serverSocket);
00239                         
00240                         set<ClientInfoPtr> clientsCopy;
00241                         {
00242                                 mutex::scoped_lock l(lock);
00243                                 clientsCopy = clients;
00244                         }
00245                         set<ClientInfoPtr>::iterator it;
00246                         for (it = clientsCopy.begin(); it != clientsCopy.end(); it++) {
00247                                 (*it)->thr->join();
00248                         }
00249                 }
00250         }
00251         
00252         ApplicationPoolPtr connect() {
00253                 int ret;
00254                 do {
00255                         // Write some random data to wake up the server.
00256                         ret = write(connectSocket, "x", 1);
00257                 } while ((ret == -1 && errno == EAGAIN) || ret == 0);
00258                 ret = MessageChannel(connectSocket).readFileDescriptor();
00259                 return ptr(new Client(ret));
00260         }

00262         /**
00263          * @warning Never call this method in the process in which this
00264          *          ApplicationPoolServer was created!
00265          */
00266         void detach() {
00267                 detached = true;
00268                 close(connectSocket);
00269                 close(serverSocket);
00270                 #ifdef VALGRIND_FRIENDLY
00271                         delete serverThread;
00272                 #endif
00273                 clients.clear();
00274                 pool.detach();
00275         }
